name: admin.users.setExpiration
desc: Set an expiration for a guest user

expiration_ts.desc: Epoch timestamp in seconds when guest account should be disabled.

user_id.desc: The ID of the user to set an expiration for.

errors.failed_looking_up_user: We couldn't find the requested user.
errors.failed_to_set_expiration: The expiration could not be set for the user.
errors.failed_to_validate_caller: The token calling this method doesn't have permission to invite a user.
errors.failed_to_validate_team: The team calling this method was invalid.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.invalid_auth: This action could not be authorized.
errors.user_is_already_deleted: The user has already been deleted and disabled.
errors.user_is_not_a_guest: The passed user_id does not belong to a guest user.
errors.user_not_found: The user could not be found.
